member.name: METARECORD
member.summary: The METARECORD structure contains a Windows-format metafile record.

member.name: METARECORD.rdSize
member.summary: The size, in words, of the record.

member.name: METARECORD.rdParm
member.summary: An array of words containing the function parameters, in reverse of the order they are passed to the function.
